CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Technical Interview stage positioned above or below the Offer Extended stage?
SRP.A: The Technical Interview stage is positioned {above} the Offer Extended stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage HR Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage HR Interview is {100%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Offer Accepted?
VE.A: The value of stage Offer Accepted is {22%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is HR Interview, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Offer Accepted, with a value of {22%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview is {26%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended is {28%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Offer Extended to stage Offer Accepted?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Offer Extended to stage Offer Accepted is {24%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 34%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {HR Interview} stage has {100%}, the {Technical Interview} stage has {74%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {46%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 34%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 11% and 87%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Technical Interview} stage has {74%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {46%}, the {Offer Accepted} stage has {22%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, or from stage Offer Extended to Offer Accepted?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Technical Interview} to {Offer Extended} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview, or from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Technical Interview} to {Offer Extended} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview, from stage Technical Interview to Offer Extended, or from stage Offer Extended to Offer Accepted?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Technical Interview} to stage {Offer Extended} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Technical Interview} and {Offer Extended} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Offer Extended} and {Offer Accepted} stages.
